Title: Increases the penalties for criminal use of a firearm in the second degree and criminal use of a firearm in the first degree
Summary: Relates to increasing the penalties for criminal use of a firearm in the second degree and criminal use of a firearm in the first degree; provides that criminal use of a firearm in the second degree is a class B felony and criminal use of a firearm in the first degree is a class A felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing the penalties for criminal use of a firearm in the second degree and criminal use of a firearm in the first degree
